mapper.insert: insert into tbl_contacts( id, source, owner, nextContactTime, mphone, job, fullname, email, description, customerId, createTime, createBy, birth, contactSummary, appellation, address )values ( #{id}, #{source}, #{owner}, #{nextContactTime}, #{mphone}, #{job}, #{fullname}, #{email}, #{description}, #{customerId}, #{createTime}, #{createBy}, #{birth}, #{contactSummary}, #{appellation}, #{address} )
